00209   int, long, unsigned int, unsigned long, \
00210   unsigned long long, long long,)

00220   const UBinary&, const UList&, const UDictionary&, const UObjectStruct&, \
00221   const USound&, const UImage&,)

00282   /*----------.
00283   | Casters.  |
00284   `----------*/
00285 
00286   // For each Type, define an operator() that casts its UValue&
00287   // argument into Type.  We need partial specialization.
00288   template <typename Type>
00289   struct uvalue_caster
00290   {
00291   };
00292 
00293   // T -> UVar&  if T = UVar
00294   // T -> T      otherwise.
00295   template <typename T>
00296   struct uvar_ref_traits
00297   {
00298     typedef T type;
00299   };
00300 
00301   template <>
00302   struct uvar_ref_traits<UVar>
00303   {
00304     typedef UVar& type;
00305   };
00306 
00307   // Run the uvalue_caster<Type> on v.
00308 
00309   /* NM: Why exactly are we moving the const away?
00310    * I'm dropping it for UValue as it makes unnecessary copy.
00311    */
00312 
00313    template<typename T> struct uvalue_cast_return_type
00314    {
00315      typedef typename libport::traits::remove_reference<T>::type type;
00316    };
00317 
00318    template<> struct uvalue_cast_return_type<const UValue&>
00319    {
00320      typedef const UValue& type;
00321    };
00322 
00323   template <typename Type>
00324   typename uvar_ref_traits<typename uvalue_cast_return_type<Type>::type>::type
00325   uvalue_cast (UValue& v);
00326

00328 
00329 #define SYNCLINE_PUSH()                                         \
00330   "//#push " BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(__LINE__) " \"" __FILE__ "\"\n"
00331 
00332 #define SYNCLINE_POP()                          \
00333   "//#pop\n"
00334 
00335 #define SYNCLINE_WRAP(...)                      \
00336   SYNCLINE_PUSH()                               \
00337   __VA_ARGS__                                   \
00338   "\n"                                          \
00339   SYNCLINE_POP()
